name: One Fifth
description: The bandit has secretly been a philosopher this whole time! He's experimenting on you - trying to test your limits. Are you truly utilitarian, all the way? Or must we sometimes judge actions themselves independent of their outcomes?

options.name: Human-Dense Track
options.description: Again, five Humans are tied down on the route of the oncoming trolley.

options.name: Slightly Less Dense Track
options.description: Four humans are tied to this track. That's only one less. Will you kill four just to save that one extra life?
